item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Rewriting Rust (107 points | 48 comments)
2. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (116 points | 40 comments)
3. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (38 points | 1 comment)
4. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (874 points | 658 comments)
5. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (190 points | 77 comments)
6. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (535 points | 168 comments)
7. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (243 points | 136 comments)
8. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (177 points | 82 comments)
9. Ask HN: Resources for Learning Graphics Programming (49 points | 32 comments)
10. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (247 points | 79 comments)
11. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (144 points | 42 comments)
12. Galaxy Buds reportedly exploded in a user's ear causing permanent hearing loss (9 points | 2 comments)
13. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (155 points | 165 comments)
14. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (120 points | 95 comments)
15. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (13 points | 2 comments)
16. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (14 points | 2 comments)
17. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (156 points | 47 comments)
18. LG TVs Start Showing Ads on Screensavers (4 points | discuss)
19. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (586 points | 411 comments)
20. Why I still blog after 15 years (377 points | 197 comments)
21. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)
22. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (279 points | 101 comments)
23. Audio Masking (111 points | 16 comments)
24. Optimizing Guile Scheme (147 points | 49 comments)
25. Show HN: Fast and Exact Algorithm for Image Merging (93 points | 28 comments)
26. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (88 points | 44 comments)
27. The Impact of Element Ordering on LM Agent Performance (34 points | 2 comments)
28. Capstone Disassembler Framework (73 points | 26 comments)
29. ts-blank-space is a fast type-stripping compiler (38 points | 35 comments)
30. Who is Marcellus Williams: Execution in Missouri despite evidence of innocence (276 points | 314 comments)
